projectCreation.title: New Storage Connector
projectCreation.content: You can connect Synapse Enterprise to Databricks Unity Catalog (UC) Volumes to import files as tasks and export annotations.

projectCreation.title: Did you know?
projectCreation.content: Try Synapse Starter Cloud, optimized for small teams and projects.

projectCreation.title: Did you know?
projectCreation.content: You can control access to specific projects and workspaces for internal team members and external annotators using Synapse Enterprise.

projectCreation.title: Labeling for GenAI
projectCreation.content: Synapse has templates available for supervised LLM fine-tuning, RAG retrieval ranking, RLHF, chatbot evaluation, and more.

organizationPage.title: It looks like your team is growing!
organizationPage.content: Assign roles to your team using Synapse Enterprise and control access to sensitive data at the project and workspace levels.

organizationPage.title: Want to simplify and secure logging in?
organizationPage.content: Enable Single Sign-On for your team using SAML, SCIM2 or LDAP with Synapse Enterprise.

organizationPage.title: Did you know?
organizationPage.content: Synapse now has a Starter Cloud offering optimized for small teams and projects.

organizationPage.title: Share knowledge with the community
organizationPage.content: Have questions or a tip to share with other Synapse users? Join the community slack channel for the latest updates.

organizationPage.title: Did you know?
organizationPage.content: Synapse supports multiple points of integration with cloud storage, machine learning models, and popular tools to automate your machine learning pipeline.

organizationPage.title: Need Compliance?
organizationPage.content: Synapse Enterprise is fully SOC 2 and HIPAA compliant. Want more control? Deploy it On-Premises for maximum flexibility.

projectSettings.title: Save time with Auto-Labeling
projectSettings.content: Use automation to instantly label large-scale datasets without sacrificing quality in the Enterprise platform.

projectSettings.title: Did you know?
projectSettings.content: Try Synapse Starter Cloud, optimized for small teams and projects.

projectSettings.title: Evaluate GenAI models
projectSettings.content: Combine automation plus human supervision to evaluate and ensure LLM quality in the Enterprise platform.

projectSettings.title: Did you know?
projectSettings.content: You can connect ML models using the backend SDK to save time with pre-labeling or active learning.

projectSettings.title: Native PDF support is coming!
projectSettings.content: Synapse Enterprise provides native PDF support.

authPage.title: Live Event Dec 10th
authPage.description: Join the Synapse product team for a fast-paced tour of this year's biggest releases

authPage.title: Auto-labeling with Prompts
authPage.description: Use LLMs to instantly pre-label thousands of tasks with accurate predictions.

authPage.title: Behind the benchmark
authPage.description: Learn how Legalbenchmarks.ai built and scaled a benchmark for practical contract drafting tasks using LLM-as-a-judge and human review in Synapse Enterprise.

authPage.title: New Enterprise Feature!
authPage.description: Chat conversations are now a native data type for creating and evaluating chat-based AI experiences in Synapse.

authPage.title: Did you know?
authPage.description: Try Synapse Starter Cloud, optimized for small teams and projects.

authPage.title: Did you know?
authPage.description: There's an Enterprise version of Synapse packed with more features and automation to label data faster while ensuring the highest quality.
